sentences.sentence: POCO I hope that we can so that we can become friends…
sentences.translation: 我希望我们能通过POCO 使我们能成为朋友…

sentences.sentence: Image is also available from Poco, photo album... photo storage sites and other references!
sentences.translation: 图片也可以从Poco, PHOTO相册等…图片存储网站引用！

sentences.sentence: You will let EF create entities for you and after modification of mapping you will generate POCO entities.
sentences.translation: 让EF创建实体，之后你可以编辑映射关系，然后生成POCO实体。
